title: how different is solo que and ranked 5's?...
body:
There is no doubt that solo que and ranked 5's is a completely different ball game.
I've been looking to join/start up a ranked team and find a duo partner to climb with for a while now, but with not too much success. Too many people add me after reading one of my posts in the forums, see that I'm (only) silver, and instantly label my as 'not good enough' to mingle with the 'superior Gold + race'.
This frustrates me a little, because they assume that someones solo que rank accurately resembles their talent (which it obviously doesn't)
I main tanky, cc, teamfighting champs, so i'm finding it hard to carry myself and my team to victory without dealing tonnes of damage. I consider myself to have a good understanding of the game, make good shot calling, and play a good team fight in game. I have no doubt that i could play to a high standard in high gold elo ranked 5's team, but no one seems to realize that solo que and ranked 5's is a completely different ball game.

Any tips or ideas from you guys that can get me into a ranked 5's team and find a regular duo partner to grow synergy with?

Cheers,
span

replies.body: SoloQ is exactly accurate of where u should be.

Probably not exactly accurate, maybe you could be a division higher or lower but not much difference with that anyways. If you can't climb in solo queue then the only reason is because that is where you belong.
Raging fuckwits is the  difference.  Team mates who rage in ranked 5s dont stay team mates for long.

start your own team is the best way,

add everyone in forums and accept everyones adds, sort everything out and then pick and choose who you want to play with and go from there.
